title: By the Protector. A proclamation commanding all papists, and all other persons, who have been of the late king's party or his sons, to repair unto their places of abode, and not to remove above five miles from the same.
author: England and Wales. Lord Protector (1653-1658 : O. Cromwell)
publisher: By Henry Hills and John Field,
notes: Fragment. Contains seal, header, and first five lines of text only.
Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
